query:
INSERT INTO holidays (scope, satker_id, holiday_date, kind, name, half_day_end)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)
                ON CONFLICT (scope, satker_id, holiday_date)
                DO UPDATE SET
                  kind = EXCLUDED.kind,
                  name = EXCLUDED.name,
                  half_day_end = EXCLUDED.half_day_end
